name: ePig Dive Treasure Hunter
description:
Recommended for iPhone 3GS and above and iPod touch 3 gen and above.

Watch the AWESOME trailers on website http://www.epiggames.com

Hey adventurer!

Join the brave Eddie Pig in this thrilling new adventure in search of wonderful treasures in the mysterious waters of the South Pacific. Thousands of wealth stolen by the Privateer Sir Francis Drake and the treasures of Juan Esteban Echeverría Ubilla XVIII are submerged there!, but you must find them!. But beware, you will fight a vengeful ghost Pirate, angry octopuses, hungry sea turtles, deranged and poisonous jellyfish, dangerous pufferfish and the impressive, legendary giant whale Mocha Dick, all in a race against time before your air runs out !. But not everything is so terrible, do not worry, you can get on a submarine and get extra energy to accomplish your task.

Only the brave will get all this gold!

Climb aboard and participate in this great and "ePig" adventure!

Become a Pirate!


Features:
45 Achievements.
Shop for Upgrades (Buy it With Game coins, NO REAL MONEY) (Hit points, Up-Down Speed, Dive Speed and Max Air)
Unique Gameplay.
Stunning Graphics. (Retina Display for supported devices)
GameCenter (for supported devices)
Funny Sounds.
Great Music.
And your favorite character, Eddie!


Instructions:
Touch Top half (Left) screen to go Up, Bottom Half Screen to go Down (Left).
Collect air, Coins, Chest, and a Capsule to get on a Submarine.

While you are on a Submarine, Touch the Right Area to Shoot a Bullet.

Avoid ALL Enemies. Only Octopus wont kill you, but will make an Ink shoot.

More info in http://www.epiggames.com
